item.title: Another option
item.content:encoded:
I have no idea why, but for this dayroll (over to March 11th) I got the message "11 finishes a new batch of Sho Nuff, and offers you one! +1 Sho Nuff Elixir!" instead!
Has this happened to anyone else for this dayroll?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: was one of the others removed, or is it 12 effects now? >.>

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I got thankyou potions as well awhile ago. Was a nice surprise, I thought it was removed.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm not sure about what it says on the edit. Mine gave me thank you potions about 2 weeks ago. Granted it only happened once so my guess is it's pretty rare but it does happen

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, according to the edit history for the article, the ThankYou Potions one was removed back in July of last year, and the new 11th effect wasn't added until 11/11 (And it only goes off then). Who knows if another effect will scroll off next year, to make room for something super-crazy on 11/11/11â€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
From BillyClub Q & A:

Has the 11th effect of Over 11,000 been shown yet? I have had the item for quite the time now and don't remember seeing 11 effects, only 10 of them.
hither 19:12 9/16
11 goes off on 11/11.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Well, I'm pretty sure it does give 11001 party house ryo per day, with a chance of an additional 11001 phryo from one of the 11 effects. I don't have it myself, but I'd assume that is it.

Anyway, I posted because I was wondering, Why are there only 10 listed effects in the '11 effects possible'? I'll look through previous revisions.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: According to the description in over 11,000 the game, it automaticaly give you the 11,000 party house ryo. Can someone confirm this?
